kv18.7:6.3: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:7.3: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:8.1: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:8.3: Hañci dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.7:9.1: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:9.3: Hañci tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.7:10.1: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:10.3: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:11.1: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:11.3: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare atthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:12.1: Dutiyassa ca jhānassa tatiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:12.3: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:13.1: Tatiyassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:13.3: Paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa antare natthi jhānantarikāti?
kv18.7:18.1: Dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭuppannānamantare avitakko vicāramatto samādhīti?
kv18.7:18.3: Nanu avitakke vicāramatte samādhimhi vattamāne paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ niruddhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ paṭuppannanti?
kv18.7:18.5: Hañci avitakke vicāramatte samādhimhi vattamāne paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ niruddhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ paṭuppannaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv18.7:18.6: “dvinnaṃ jhānānaṃ paṭuppannānamantare avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantarikā”ti.
kv18.7:19.3: Avitakko vicāramatto samādhi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ … pe …
kv18.7:19.11: Tena hi avitakko vicāramatto samādhi jhānantarikāti.
kv18.7:20.4: “savitakko savicāro samādhi”, avitakko vicāramatto samādhi, avitakko avicāro samādhī”ti?
kv18.7:20.9: avicāro samādhi”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
